text:
NOW TV [http://nowtv.com] | London, UK | Onsite | VISA sponsorship considered | Permanent/Full time

We're looking for React/Javascript developers.

We run a video streaming service as part of Sky UK (you'll get free Sky - TV, Talk & Broadband). We work in a self-empowered, Agile (scrumban) way.

Our stack - React (ES6), Flux, Ruby, Cucumber, Mocha.

If this sounds cool, send me an email: lawrence.dabir-alai[AT]sky.uk
